name: Dr. Tega
description:
(Playing the Windows Version is highly recommended)

(All scripts, music and models were created within the 7 days of the jam from scratch)

Submission for the Bullet Hell Jam 2021

Programming by https://nickfrex.itch.io/ and https://hex08.itch.io/

Music by https://superbeppe98.itch.io/

3D Models by https://cialdi.itch.io/

Controls: WASD to move, Mouse to aim and shoot

Dr. Tega likes to mess with time. But unfortunately the machine has broken, and evil beings are breaking into the lab to chase after him! Shoot em down

FAQ: Q: What does TEGA stand for? A: Transdimensional Encoding Gyroplanar Appliance
